verses.name: Matthew 26:62
verses.text: And the high priest arose, and said unto him, Answerest thou nothing? what is it which these witness against thee?

verses.name: Matthew 26:63
verses.text: But Jesus held his peace. And the high priest answered and said unto him, I adjure thee by the living God, that thou tell us whether thou be the Christ, the Son of God.

verses.name: Matthew 26:64
verses.text: Jesus saith unto him, Thou hast said: nevertheless I say unto you, Hereafter shall ye see the Son of man sitting on the right hand of power, and coming in the clouds of heaven.
